title: Edgar Davis (golfer)
text: Edgar Davis (October 7, 1873 – April 23, 1927) was an American <a href="golf">golf</a>er. He competed in the <a href="Golf%20at%20the%201904%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20individual">men's individual event</a> at the <a href="1904%20Summer%20Olympics">1904 Summer Olympics</a>.
